title: Is a Teacher allowed to accept gifts from Students or Parents at the end of year
transcript: from ad ad says that is a teacher at a private school allowed to accept gifts from students on their or their parents after the school year is over if the students will uh uh continue to study in that school no it's not permissible because this is like a bribe okay they give me at the end of the year a good a Rolex watch and next year I'll teach them no I will definitely take care of them next year but if they're graduating and leaving yes it is permissible to take their uh um gifts because there is no conflict of interest and
